title: @Quiet_Talkers
description: A script to find and kill AFNI processes

sudo.title: Sudo flag
sudo.description: Invoke higher powers to kill processes that you do not own

prog.title: Program list
prog.description: Instead of the default program list, only kill the specified program. You can use multiple -prog options

npb_val.title: NIML port block values
npb_val.description: Kill those programs using NIML port block NV

npb_range.title: NIML port block range
npb_range.description: Kill those using NIML port blocks between NV0 and NV1

pif_key.title: Key string
pif_key.description: Kill those programs that have a string matching KEY_STRING in their commandline

no_npb.title: No NPB flag
no_npb.description: Kill any program in the list regardless of -npb options or -pif

list.title: List flag
list.description: Just list process numbers, don't run kill command
